lead_paragraph: A court document made public on Thursday suggests that defense lawyers will argue that Mr. Gray was already injured when he was loaded into a Baltimore police van.
snippet: A court document made public on Thursday suggests that defense lawyers will argue that Mr. Gray was already injured when he was loaded into a Baltimore police van.

headline.main: Freddie Gray Complained of ‘Bad Back’ Before Arrest, Filing Says
headline.print_headline: Freddie Gray Had Bad Back, a Filing Says

abstract: Lawyers for Officer Caesar R Goodson Jr file document that says Freddie Gray Jr complained about back trouble less than two weeks before he died of broken neck while in police custody; prosecutors say Gray sustained injury while he was bound in police van driven by Goodson, but defense document suggests Goodson's team will argue that Gray was already injured.
